title: My phone's getting stuck often.Some digital screen(not sure what it is) appears on top.
content: I've restarted and I've tried the safe mode, nothing helps. I even uninstalled few apps, cleared space in my gallery. But the digital screen keeps appearing, even now while I'm typing this. I tried taking a screenshot and the digital screen doesn't appear on the screenshot. I'm not sure what the problem is. Please help me with this.
